title: Launch a Food Truck Empire
prompt: Design a brand, create a menu, manage a budget, and compete in a city-wide food festival
description: Start from scratch with your own food truck business. Learn about branding, menu pricing, supply chain management, and customer service while competing against other food trucks in the ultimate festival challenge.
subject: Life Essentials

title: Open a Themed Cafe
prompt: From a cat cafe to a board game cafe, manage inventory, design the space, and serve virtual customers
description: Create the perfect themed cafe experience. Choose your theme, design the interior, manage inventory, hire staff, and keep customers happy while building a profitable business.
subject: Life Essentials

title: Manage a Professional Sports Team
prompt: Act as General Manager for a basketball, soccer, or esports team. Handle player trades, ticket pricing, and stadium upgrades
description: Take control of a professional sports franchise. Make strategic decisions about player acquisitions, team chemistry, ticket pricing, marketing campaigns, and stadium management.
subject: Physical Education

title: Run a Record Label
prompt: Discover new AI-generated artists, manage their careers, design album art, and promote their music
description: Build a music empire by discovering talent, producing albums, managing artist careers, and navigating the complex world of music promotion and distribution.
subject: Music Discovery

title: Start a Clothing Brand
prompt: Design apparel, source virtual materials, set prices, and launch a marketing campaign
description: From concept to runway, create your own fashion brand. Design unique clothing, understand textile sourcing, set competitive prices, and market to your target demographic.
subject: Creative Arts

title: Develop a Video Game Studio
prompt: Create a game concept, manage a development team (with AI teammates), and market the final product
description: Lead a video game development studio from concept to launch. Manage programming, art, sound, and marketing teams while balancing creative vision with commercial viability.
subject: Computer and Technology

title: Run a Pet Adoption Agency
prompt: Care for virtual animals, manage the shelter's budget, and create adoption profiles to find them homes
description: Operate a pet adoption center focused on finding loving homes for animals. Manage animal care, adoption processes, community outreach, and shelter operations.
subject: Life Essentials

title: Launch a Tech Startup
prompt: Develop a new app idea, create a business plan, and pitch it to virtual venture capitalists
description: Navigate the startup ecosystem from idea to funding. Develop your product, build a team, create financial projections, and perfect your pitch for investors.
subject: Computer and Technology

title: Manage a Movie Theater
prompt: Select films to show, set ticket and concession prices, and run promotions to maximize attendance
description: Run a successful movie theater business. Choose which films to show, optimize pricing strategies, manage concessions, and create marketing campaigns to boost attendance.
subject: Life Essentials

title: Create a Subscription Box Service
prompt: Curate monthly boxes for a specific hobby (e.g., art, science experiments, books) and manage logistics
description: Build a subscription service that delivers curated experiences to customers' doors. Handle product sourcing, logistics, customer service, and retention strategies.
subject: Life Essentials

title: Mission to Mars Colony
prompt: Design a habitat, plan resource management, and navigate the challenges of colonizing Mars
description: Lead humanity's first permanent settlement on Mars. Solve complex problems of life support, resource extraction, habitat construction, and crew psychology in an alien environment.
subject: Science

title: Deep Sea Submarine Expedition
prompt: Explore the Mariana Trench, discover new species, and study hydrothermal vents
description: Command a deep-sea research vessel to explore Earth's final frontier. Discover new species, study unique ecosystems, and unlock the mysteries of the deep ocean.
subject: Science

title: Dinosaur Safari Park
prompt: Design and manage a park for dinosaurs, ensuring enclosures are safe and habitats are appropriate
description: Create the ultimate dinosaur experience while ensuring visitor safety and animal welfare. Design exhibits, manage breeding programs, and handle emergencies.
subject: Science

title: Volcano Response Team
prompt: Monitor volcanic activity around the world and create evacuation plans for nearby populations
description: Lead an international volcano monitoring network. Predict eruptions, coordinate evacuations, and help communities prepare for and recover from volcanic disasters.
subject: Geography

title: Build a Lunar Base
prompt: Design a sustainable base on the moon, focusing on life support and energy systems
description: Establish humanity's first permanent lunar outpost. Engineer life support systems, manage resources, and prepare for the challenges of long-term space habitation.
subject: Science

title: Direct a Short Animated Film
prompt: Write a script, design characters, create storyboards, and produce a 3-minute animated short
description: Bring your story to life through animation. Develop characters, write compelling dialogue, plan visual sequences, and direct the production of your animated masterpiece.
subject: Creative Arts

title: Produce a Podcast Series
prompt: Choose a topic, research episodes, record and edit audio, and design cover art
description: Create an engaging podcast from concept to distribution. Research compelling content, master audio production techniques, and build an audience.
subject: Native Language

title: Create a Comic Book
prompt: Develop characters and a plot, then draw and letter a full 24-page comic
description: Tell your story through sequential art. Create memorable characters, craft engaging plots, and master the visual language of comics.
subject: Creative Arts

title: Launch a Virtual Band
prompt: Write songs, design a band logo and look, play virtual concerts, and go on tour
description: Build a music career from the ground up. Compose original music, develop a band identity, and navigate the music industry to achieve stardom.
subject: Music Discovery

title: Design a Video Game Level
prompt: Use a simplified 3D engine to design, build, and test a playable level for a platformer or adventure game
description: Create an engaging game experience through level design. Balance challenge and fun while telling a story through environmental design.
subject: Computer and Technology

title: Run for Mayor
prompt: Create a platform, give speeches, run a campaign, and, if elected, manage the city's budget and policies
description: Experience democracy in action by running for mayor. Develop policy positions, campaign for votes, and govern a virtual city if elected.
subject: History & Religion

title: Design a New Law
prompt: Identify a community problem, research solutions, draft a legislative bill, and debate it in a simulated council
description: Navigate the legislative process from identifying problems to passing solutions. Research issues, draft legislation, and engage in democratic debate.
subject: History & Religion

title: Launch a Non-Profit Organization
prompt: Write a mission statement, develop a fundraising plan, and run a program to address a social need
description: Create positive change through nonprofit work. Identify social needs, build programs to address them, and manage the organization sustainably.
subject: Life Essentials

title: Organize a Community Service Project
prompt: Plan and execute a project like a park cleanup, a food drive, or a fundraiser for a local shelter
description: Make a real difference in your community through organized service. Plan projects, recruit volunteers, and measure your impact.
subject: Life Essentials

title: The Mock Trial
prompt: Take on the role of a lawyer, witness, or juror in a simulated court case
description: Experience the justice system firsthand through realistic courtroom simulations. Build cases, examine witnesses, and seek justice.
subject: History & Religion

title: Design and Build a Rollercoaster
prompt: Use physics principles to design a thrilling but safe rollercoaster
description: Engineer the perfect thrill ride using physics and mathematics. Balance excitement with safety while creating an unforgettable experience.
subject: Mathematics

title: The Rube Goldberg Machine Challenge
prompt: Create a complex machine to perform a simple task
description: Design elaborate chain reaction machines that accomplish simple tasks in the most complicated way possible. Learn about physics and engineering through playful creativity.
subject: Science

title: The Bridge Builder
prompt: Design and test bridges to withstand different loads and environmental conditions
description: Engineer bridges that connect communities while withstanding the forces of nature. Learn structural engineering through hands-on design challenges.
subject: Mathematics

title: Robotics Competition
prompt: Build and code a virtual robot to complete a series of challenges in an arena
description: Combine engineering and programming to create championship robots. Design, build, and program robots to excel in competitive challenges.
subject: Computer and Technology

title: The Skyscraper Challenge
prompt: Design a skyscraper that is both aesthetically pleasing and structurally sound enough to withstand wind and earthquakes
description: Reach for the sky with architectural engineering. Design beautiful towers that can withstand natural disasters while serving urban communities.
subject: Mathematics

title: The First Car Purchase
prompt: Research different cars, create a budget, secure a virtual loan, and negotiate a price
description: Navigate one of life's major purchases with confidence. Learn about financing, insurance, depreciation, and negotiation in the car buying process.
subject: Life Essentials

title: The College Application Journey
prompt: Research colleges, write application essays, prepare for interviews, and fill out financial aid forms
description: Successfully navigate the complex college application process. Research schools, craft compelling applications, and secure financial aid.
subject: Life Essentials

title: The Personal Budget Challenge
prompt: Manage a monthly budget for a year, making choices about spending, saving, and investing
description: Master personal finance through practical budgeting experience. Learn to balance wants and needs while building long-term financial health.
subject: Mathematics

title: Plan a Trip Around the World
prompt: Research destinations, book flights and hotels, and manage a travel budget and itinerary
description: Explore the world through careful planning and budgeting. Research cultures, plan routes, and manage travel logistics for the adventure of a lifetime.
subject: Geography

title: The Healthy Habits Challenge
prompt: A 30-day challenge to track nutrition, exercise, and sleep to see their impact on virtual well-being
description: Discover the science of wellness through personal experimentation. Track health metrics and learn how lifestyle choices impact physical and mental well-being.
subject: Mental Wellness
